subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks played from behind all evening, as they almost always do, watching the Dallas Mavericks build a 23-point lead and inspiring the usual derisive chants from an increasingly irate crowd.
snippet: The Knicks played from behind all evening, as they almost always do, watching the Dallas Mavericks build a 23-point lead and inspiring the usual derisive chants from an increasingly irate crowd.
